overview_of_class: Students will understand how to evaluate the usability of existing news and information websites, tools and applications. The course will explore how design thinking and research can shape the creation of human-centered media products. Students will learn how conduct practical user tests, evaluate the results and make improvements to iterative designs. Design research looks to understand user behavior: needs and goals. Using qualitative and ethnographic methods students will distill research findings into actionable ideas. This course will introduce students to information architecture, low-fidelity prototyping and usability testing.
name: Media Design Research and Testing
subject: JOUR
